item.description:
@Killer-99-pkz wrote:

i sent messsage on how to fix
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2008, 01:02:02 PM[/size][hr]the thing i gave you is just to make it so you cant right click on some one and click duel and then mage outside of wild if you want to make it so you cant mage at all
just put this in your packet 249 if (6+6=12) {break;} //=))))

item.title: Need help stopping people maging in/out safe zone PLEASE help
item.dc:creator: @Marc323909 Marc323909
item.description:
@Marc323909 wrote:

Ok,thanks but I get 1 error which is

client.java:17867: cannot find symbol symbol : variable other location: class client other.canmage = true; ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Any ideas?

item.source: Need help stopping people maging in/out safe zone PLEASE help

item.title: Need help stopping people maging in/out safe zone PLEASE help
item.dc:creator: @Killer-99-pkz Killer-99-pkz
item.description:
@Killer-99-pkz wrote:

oh yea i fixed that

Here try this

Put this in your Delares

public boolean canmagewild;
public boolean canmage;

Search For case 249 put this at the very begging

if (canmage == false && canmagewild == false) {
break;
}

now search for void startduel

Add this in there
canmage = true;
other.canmage = true;

Then find p.DuelVictory();
After that add
canmage = false;
p.canmage = false;

Find this case 130:
then once your there search resetDuel();

Then before it add
canmage = false;

Now find public boolean isInWilderness(int coord

And see where it ses
if ((coordY >= 3520) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) {

Add this after it

canmagewild = true;

And make shure you do it after ALL OF THEM

Then at the end it ses
return false;
}
Right before return false;
Add canmagewild = false;

There you go DO NOT TRY TO STEAL WHAT IVE DONE use it for your own benifits

Read full topic

item.title: Need help stopping people maging in/out safe zone PLEASE help
item.dc:creator: @Marc323909 Marc323909
item.description:
@Marc323909 wrote:

Ok I added a safezone in pk it works BUT people can mage whille they are in the safezone and they can mage people in safe zone does anyone know how I can fix this? Its a Dodian source

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3039 && absX <= 3111 && absY >= 3475 && absY <=3523 ) || (absX >= 2790 && absX <= 2855 && absY >= 3418 && absY <=3466 ) || (absX >= 2584 && absX <= 2612 && absY >= 3153 && absY <=3169 ) || (absX >= 2935 && absX <= 3066 && absY >= 2935 && absY <= 3399 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=2747 && absX <=2758 && absY >=2794 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2764 && absX <=2776 && absY >=2793 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2773 && absX <=2780 && absY >=2766 && absY <=2770 ) || (absX >=2751 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2777 ) || (absX >=2785 && absX <=2809 && absY >=2771 && absY <=2801 ) || (absX >=2732 && absX <=2740 && absY >=2789 && absY <=2796 ) || (absX >=2861 && absX <=2872 && absY >=10186 && absY <=10212 ) || (absX >=3409 && absX <=3452 && absY >=3532 && absY <=3575 ) || (absX >=2435 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3080 && absY <=3099 ) || (absX >=3267 && absX <=3332 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3270 ) || (absX >=3151 && absX <=3182 && absY >=3220 && absY <=3272 ) || (absX >=3032 && absX <=3063 && absY >=3424 && absY <=3457 ) || (absX >=3476 && absX <=3501 && absY >=9483 && absY <=9505 ) || (absX >=2942 && absX <=2992 && absY >=3390 && absY <=3414 ) || (absX >=2420 && absX <=2431 && absY >=3072 && absY <=3083 ) || (absX >=3071 && absX <=3122 && absY >=3456 && absY <=3523 ) || (absX >=3101 && absX <=3124 && absY >=9825 && absY <=9849 ) || (absX >=2585 && absX <=2605 && absY >=3153 && absY <=3169 ) || (absX >=2853 && absX <=2926 && absY >=3530 && absY <=3577 ) || (absX >=2579 && absX <=2622 && absY >=3841 && absY <=3902 ) || (absX >=2887 && absX <=2699 && absY >=2939 && absY <=2741 ) || (absX >=2742 && absX <=2815 && absY >=3146 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=2692 && absX <=2810 && absY >=2690 && absY <=2808 ) || (absX >= 2437 && absX <=2446 && absY >= 3082 && absY <=3098 ) ||(absX >= 3090 && absX <=3098 && absY >= 3919 && absY <=3932 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; } public void inCombat() { LogoutDelay = 1; }

Can you please tell me what I have done wrong,thanks people CANNOT melee or range in safe zone JUST mage

This is what I have under case 249

[code][code] case 249:
// Magic on Players
int playerIndex = inStream.readSignedWordA();
int playerMagicID = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();

		// A Bunch of checks to make sure player is not a null -bakatool
		if (!((playerIndex >= 0) && (playerIndex < server.playerHandler.players.length))) {
			break;
		}
		if (!antiHax())
			break;
		Player castOnPlayerCheck = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex];
		client castOnPlayer = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex];

		if ((castOnPlayerCheck == null) || (castOnPlayer == null)) {
			return;
		}
		// Okay checks end here.
		int playerTargetX = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].absX;
		int playerTargetY = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].absY;
		int playerTargetCombat = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].combat;
		int playerTargetHealth = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		int castterX = absX;
		int castterY = absY;
		int casterX = absX;
		int casterY = absY;
		int offsetY2 = (absX - playerTargetX) * -1;
		int offsetX2 = (absY - playerTargetY) * -1;
		int heal = 0;
		hitDiff = 0;
		if (duelFight && duelRule[2]) {
			sendMessage("Magic has been disabled for this duel!");
			break;
		}
		long thisAttack = System.currentTimeMillis();
		MageAttackIndex = playerIndex;
		if ((playerIndex == duel_with)
				|| (isInWilderness(playerTargetX, playerTargetY, 1) == true)
				|| (IsInCW(playerTargetX, playerTargetY) == true)
				|| (IsInTz(playerTargetX, playerTargetY) == true)
				|| ((matchId == handler.players[playerIndex].matchId) && (matchId >= 0))) {
			if (handler.players[playerIndex].matchLives < 1) {
				sendMessage("This player has been eliminated");
				break;
			}
			if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAttack < 2000) {
				sendMessage("WAIT 2 seconds!");
				break;
			}
			inCombat = true;
			lastCombat = System.currentTimeMillis();
			lastAttack = lastCombat;

			TurnPlayerTo(playerTargetX, playerTargetY);
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

			teleportToX = absX;
			teleportToY = absY;
			MagicHandler.playerX = playerTargetX;
			MagicHandler.playerY = playerTargetY;
			MagicHandler.playerHP = playerTargetHealth;

			spellPlayerIndex = MagicHandler.magicSpellPlayer(playerMagicID,
					playerId, playerIndex, MultiTargetSpell(playerMagicID),
					StillSpell(playerMagicID), playerLevel[6]);
		}
		break;[/code] I have that but im not sure what to do =[[/code]
